about_the_game:
The most impactful moment in discovering yourself in your life was when?

Self-Portrait is a short exploration game on a island filled with chickens in a dream.
Enjoy observing the growth of chickens through four seasons, dancing chickens, and others in the coop.

What does the protagonist look like in this dream?

Although the game is short, it is filled with lots of hidden elements , so we highly recommend exploring every corner of the island right away!
If you ever feel like ending the exploration, look for "Hun"!

View Points:

-A beautiful island with all four seasons: Spring, Summer, Autumn, and Winter.
-Chickens that grow along with the changing seasons.
-Calming music.
-Hidden contents waiting to be discovered.
-An ending that helps you understand what does the portagonist look like.

If you had a great time with this game, please take a look at our other games at LIONST!
We promise to continue delivering various experiences to you through the medium of games!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13+
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 4850 or GeForce 830M
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

name: Self-Portrait

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11 64bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel Dual Core, 3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 4850 or GeForce 830M
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Self-Portrait is a short exploration game on a island filled with chickens in a dream. Enjoy observing the growth of chickens through four seasons, dancing chickens, and others in the coop.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, French, Italian, German
